author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Myriad Genetics Q2 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.31
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Myriad Genetics Inc:
* MYRIAD GENETICS REPORTS FISCAL SECOND-QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q2 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.31 * Q2 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 * Q2 REVENUE $194 MILLION * MYRIAD GENETICS - ‍TAX REFORM LEGISLATION WILL POSITIVELY BENEFIT FISCAL 2018 FY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE BY ABOUT $0.06 WITH $0.02 RECORDED IN FISCAL Q2​
* SEES ‍FISCAL YEAR 2018 REVENUE BETWEEN $760-$770 MILLION​
* SEES FY18 GAAP DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE ‍$1.82-$1.87​ * SEES FY18 ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE ‍$1.11-$1.16​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
